sources.title: The Unholy Three 1925 Colorized
sources.description: Enjoyable quirky story, directed by Tod Browning, of a trio of conmen comprised of Echo the ventriloquist, Tweedledee the midget, and Hercules the strongman, and their escalating crime spree. Stars Lon Chaney, Harry Earles and Victor McLaglen. Colorized using DeOldify technology. No soundtrack. IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0016473 (Note: Although this movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. Thanks.)
